subSubSection.paragraph:
Agenioideus ( Agenioideus ) pacificus Lelej
in Lelej et al . 1994: 140, ♀ ♂ .
Type locality . Primorskii Terr. ( Russia ), South Korea .

Holotype
( ♂ ). Приморский край / Андреевка / Лелей I VIII 1990 [ Russia , Primorskii Terr., Andreevka, 1.VIII.1990 (A. Lelej)] // Holotypus /
Agenioideus
/
pacificus Lelej

Current status .
Agenioideus ( Agenioideus ) pacificus Lelej, 1994
.
Distribution . Russia : Far East (Primorskii Terr.); South Korea (Loktionov & Lelej 2017).
Remarks . The species is considered here as valid. See explanations in Loktionov & Lelej 2014: 222 .
